item.title: 债券和比索下挫，米莱伊团队努力遏制贿赂丑闻
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊的高级官员们采取行动，控制针对一位盟友的贿赂指控所造成的影响，在流动性紧缩导致利率飙升的情况下，这些指控对阿根廷的美元债券造成了压力。【原文：President Javier Milei’s top officials moved to contain fallout from bribery allegations against an ally that are weighing on Argentina’s dollar bonds amid a liquidity crunch that’s sent interest rates soaring.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话后交易员权衡降息前景，国债下跌
item.description: 美国国债在本周一系列政府债券拍卖前下滑，从周五美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示最快可能在下个月降息时引发的涨势中回落。【原文：US Treasuries slipped ahead of a series of government bond auctions this week, pulling back from the rally unleashed Friday when Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell indicated that interest rate cuts may come as soon as next month.】

item.title: 对冲基金赢得美国证券交易委员会对卖空披露规则的审查
item.description: 联邦上诉法院下令审查美国证券交易委员会的规定，这些规定要求投资者披露更多有关卖空和相关股票借贷的信息。【原文：A federal appeals court ordered a review of US Securities and Exchange Commission rules that required investors to reveal far more about short selling and related stock lending.】

item.title: 交易所库存减少，阿拉比卡咖啡涨势扩大
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡期货在纽约连续第九个交易日攀升，创下三个多月来的最高点，原因是库存减少，而且头号生产国巴西的装运停滞不前。【原文：Arabica coffee futures climbed for the ninth straight session in New York, hitting the highest in over three months as stockpiles decrease and as shipments from top producer Brazil stall.】

item.title: 马斯克起诉苹果和 OpenAI，称其损害人工智能竞争
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在诉讼中指控苹果公司和 OpenAI 不公平地偏袒 iPhone 上的人工智能应用程序，阻碍了其他聊天机器人制造商的竞争。【原文：Elon Musk accused Apple Inc. and OpenAI in a lawsuit of unfairly favoring the artificial intelligence app across iPhones and thwarting competition for other chatbot makers.】

item.title: JAB 动用 125 亿美元转投咖啡大赌注
item.description: 多年来，JAB Holding Co. 一直在通过整合知名品牌和收购行业领导者来策划一些最大的消费交易。【原文：For years, JAB Holding Co. has been orchestrating some of the biggest consumer deals by consolidating well-known brands and taking on industry leaders.】

item.title: 第一量子放弃出售赞比亚铜矿股权计划
item.description: 第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）在 10 亿美元的黄金流交易缓解了资产负债表压力之后，搁置了出售赞比亚铜矿少数股权的计划。【原文：First Quantum Minerals Ltd. has shelved a plan to sell minority stakes in its Zambian copper mines, after a $1 billion gold-streaming deal eased balance-sheet pressures.】

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper 被 S&P Global 列入负面评级观察名单
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）表示，预计将Keurig Dr Pepper Inc.的评级下调至垃圾级，以回应这家饮料生产商计划以157亿欧元（184亿美元）收购JDE Peet's NV。【原文：S&P Global Ratings said it anticipates lowering Keurig Dr Pepper Inc.’s ratings one step closer to junk, in response to the beverage maker’s plan to acquire JDE Peet’s NV for €15.7 billion ($18.4 billion).】

item.title: 立陶宛在总理选举前达成执政联盟新协议
item.description: 立陶宛社会民主党达成了一项新的联盟协议，在波罗的海国家新总理选举投票前夕获得了议会中的广泛多数。【原文：Lithuania’s Social Democrats clinched a new coalition agreement, securing a wide majority in parliament on the eve of a vote on the Baltic nation’s new prime minister.】

item.title: 美国新房销售额上调后超预期
item.description: 美国 7 月份新房销售量超出预期，而上个月的销售量被向上修正，原因是房价有所回落，而且重磅优惠措施吸引了更多购房者出手。【原文：Sales of new US homes exceeded forecasts in July after an upward revision to the prior month, as prices eased and heavy incentives enticed more buyers off the fence.】

item.title: 白水公司同意继续建设得克萨斯州天然气管道
item.description: 由白水中游公司（WhiteWater Midstream）牵头的一个集团已同意着手建设一条管道，将更多的天然气从得克萨斯州西部的二叠纪盆地输送到休斯顿地区。【原文：A group led by WhiteWater Midstream has agreed to proceed with building a pipeline to bring more natural gas from the Permian Basin in West Texas to the Houston area.】

item.title: 生物技术公司转向数字硬币和加密货币以提振股价
item.description: 它们本应站在医学的最前沿。然而，一些规模很小的生物技术公司在股市的急速上涨中被远远抛在后面，它们正在寻求一种新的万能药：加密货币。【原文：They’re supposed to be on the cutting edge of medicine. Yet some tiny biotech companies, largely left behind in the stock market’s breakneck rally, are pursuing a new cure-all: Cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 美联储降息热情消退，美股反弹失去动力
item.description: 美国股市周一走低，上周对降息可能性的欣喜情绪逐渐消退，交易商将注意力转回到关税和美国企业的利润前景上。【原文：US stocks drifted lower Monday, after last week’s euphoria over the potential for interest-rate cuts faded as traders turned their attention back to tariffs and corporate America’s profit outlook.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击加剧俄罗斯夏季燃料紧张
item.description: 乌克兰无人机对俄罗斯炼油厂的袭击加剧了国内燃料市场的夏季危机，导致价格在季节性需求旺盛的情况下飙升。【原文：Ukrainian drone strikes on Russian oil refineries have exacerbated a summer crisis on the domestic fuel market, leading to a spike in prices amid high seasonal demand.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司在注入现金之前需要诺沃诺公司退出 Braskem 公司
item.description: 巴西国有控股石油公司负责人表示，只有在陷入困境的石油化工制造商 Braskem SA 的合作伙伴出售给新投资者的情况下，她才会考虑向该公司注入更多资金。【原文：The head of Brazil’s state-controlled oil company said she would only consider injecting more money into debt-ridden petrochemicals maker Braskem SA if its troubled partner in the company sold to a new investor.】

item.title: Pinault 家族正在探索彪马的各种选择，包括出售
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在德国运动品牌彪马 SE 去年市值缩水约一半之后，Pinault 家族正在权衡包括出售在内的各种选择。【原文：The Pinault family is weighing options for Puma SE including a sale after the German sports brand lost about half of its market value in the past year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽维恩看好哈佛市政债券在特朗普压力下的价值
item.description: 努文有限责任公司（Nuveen LLC）称，唐纳德-特朗普总统针对哈佛大学的竞选活动正在使这所名校的债券便宜到通常与风险较高行业相关的低价水平。【原文：President Donald Trump’s campaign against Harvard University is cheapening the prestigious school’s bonds to bargain levels usually associated with riskier sectors, according to Nuveen LLC.】

item.title: 马来西亚推出首款人工智能设备芯片，加入全球竞赛
item.description: 马来西亚周一发布了自己的人工智能处理器，加入了一场全球竞赛，为人工智能开发制造最抢手的电子元件。【原文：Malaysia unveiled its own AI processor Monday, joining a global race to build the most sought-after electronic components for artificial intelligence development.】

item.title: Flutter 以新立法禁令为由停止在印度的在线投注
item.description: Flutter Entertainment Plc.表示，在印度于 8 月 22 日通过立法禁止真钱博彩后，该公司已停止了在印度的真钱博彩业务。【原文：Flutter Entertainment Plc. said it has halted its real-money betting operations in India following legislation banning it that was passed on Aug. 22.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司应对全球石油供应过剩的办法是抽取更多原油
item.description: 巴西的国有控股能源公司有一个简单的公式来度过当前石油市场的供应过剩：泵出更多的原油。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled energy company has a simple formula for steering through the current oil market glut: pump more crude.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 同意以 12.3 亿美元收购 Verint
item.description: Thoma Bravo 已同意以 12.3 亿美元现金收购 Verint Systems Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo has agreed to buy Verint Systems Inc. for $1.23 billion in cash as the private equity firm builds out its software portfolio.】

item.title: 据说三菱即将投资富勒顿健康公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，三菱商事即将投资新加坡医院运营商富勒顿健康公司（Fullerton Health），这家日本公司正寻求在东南亚扩张。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. is nearing an investment in Singapore-based hospital operator Fullerton Health, people with knowledge of the matter said, as the Japanese firm seeks to expand in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 沙特 Humain 公司推出具有 "伊斯兰 "价值观的阿拉伯语聊天机器人
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯领先的人工智能公司 Humain 推出了一款面向阿拉伯人和穆斯林的人工智能对话应用程序，以寻求在该技术领域的地区领导地位。【原文：Humain, Saudi Arabia’s leading artificial intelligence company, has launched a conversational AI app for Arabs and Muslims as the kingdom seeks regional leadership in the technology.】

item.title: 现在美国的 ETF 数量超过了个股数量
item.description: ETF 的蓬勃发展使全美投资民主化，但这股热潮正达到一个临界点。投资者和财务顾问有太多的基金可供选择。【原文：The ETF boom that has democratized investing across America is reaching a tipping point. Investors and financial advisers have too many funds to choose from.】

item.title: 预测市场 Kalshi 聘请影响力人士 John Wang 领导加密货币推进工作
item.description: Kalshi Inc.聘请了从加密货币创始人转行成为影响力人物的约翰-王（John Wang），因为该预测市场正努力加深与数字资产世界的联系。【原文：Kalshi Inc. hired John Wang, a crypto-founder-turned-influencer, as the prediction marketplace seeks to deepen its ties in the digital-asset world.】

item.title: 伊兹密尔港谈判失败后土耳其转向当地投资者
item.description: 六个月前，向阿拉伯联合酋长国 AD 港口集团出售爱琴海港口经营权的谈判破裂，土耳其正将目光转向当地投资者。【原文：Turkey is turning its focus to local investors after talks to sell operating rights for an Aegean port to the United Arab Emirates’ AD Ports Group collapsed six months ago.】

item.description: Vornado Realty Trust 同意购买纽约萨克斯第五大道旗舰店（Saks Fifth Avenue Inc.【原文：Vornado Realty Trust agreed to buy an office condominium above Saks Fifth Avenue Inc.’s flagship department store in New York.】

item.title: 新月能源公司将以 31 亿美元收购生命能源公司
item.description: 得克萨斯州油气生产商新月能源公司（Crescent Energy Co.【原文：Texas oil and gas producer Crescent Energy Co. agreed to buy Vital Energy Inc. for $3.1 billion, including debt.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德告诉福克斯：欧元区可以承受美国更高的关税
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德说，美国提高关税不会破坏欧元区经济，欧元区经济正处于复苏的边缘。【原文：Higher US tariffs won’t derail the euro-area economy, which is on the brink of a recovery, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said.】
